string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Welcome to LineageOS, click for other tips
Privay guard helps you protect your private data from installed apps
Protected apps will restrict access to apps with private data by adding a pattern
Live display optimizes your screen basing on the time of the day and ambient conditions
Double tap the status bar to turn the screen off
Yer lookin\' for teh Br0tips? Call\'em

string-array.name: br0tips
string-array.item: Want some more home screens?\nSwipe left and right to find them\n(No theft required)
Ballmer Peak: Optimal coding ability takes place between a BAC of .129 and .138.
GUYS, GUYS, 0 times 0 is ALWAYS 0
Home is a garden: touch & hold an empty spot to grow new icons
Always catproof your electronics, cats are bound to pee on them
Touch Market for apps. Like a box of chocolates, each one a surprise
Don\'t listen to Dr Kmobs. He is a real doctor, but that is not a thermometer
Kmobs is actually a doctor now! But that is still not a stethoscope
For 100\u0025 Minnesotan, add baijiu to invisiblek
For \"white guy dancing\" add decad3nce and broncos
Can\'t stop won\'t stop
We tried to butter toastcfh and drop him to see if he landed right side up, but all we got was wimax
Mama ciwrl knows best. Presents a choice, but decides for you anyway
shareef is to telephony what giuliani is to cyber
For over inflated ego, apply one maniac103 code review
Code not complex enough? Add a layer of jruesga
That\'s not a squatting unicorn, that\'s a squatting roman
When nothing is broken, revamp it with some jrizzoli
There has to be something about a cyanogen force push
Want to see eventual collapse of society? Offset a pixel for kover and asher
Steve had force push, then we forked
Senyor doesn\'t speak spanish, but he does speak margaritas
Some people say that psychoi3oy caught a fly with chopsticks, but no one has seen the JIRA ticket for it
decad3nce: jaded since he started working at inc
s0be was named before the drink failed, we have kernel commits to prove it
Don\'t forget to keep your winzip up to date
mikeioannina can only be translated in 14 languages, otherwise we have to gc gerrit
Some people say arcee is older than the known universe. But we don\'t have the tools or the scotch to carbon date him
Sorry, boss had a question. Now i can get back to work
brinly, at his too young of age, has won more vulnerability bounties than Isaac Newton had created motion laws

Development Process of Rashed:
1. Find bug
2. Get blocked by arceen
3. Attempt to ask invisiblek for help
4. ???
5. panel.sh
bbiab: i need food
Shipit and buy donuts later
Gotta hax that
decad3nce: more tequila please
decad3nce: oh god, not tequila
When stuff is working too well, add a bit of javelinanddart
rashed: Works 100\u0025, except those 9 of 10 features
